trans-unit.source: Provides methods for identifying the components of a component.
This interface provides methods that can be used to identify components of a component that are inherited from a base class.

To determine what components are inherited, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method and pass the component to search and an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> to store references to the identified components.

Call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method to retrieve an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component that has been identified by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method.

Searches the specified component for fields that implement the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and adds each to the specified container, storing the inheritance level of each which can be retrieved using the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)"></xref> method.

This method searches the specified component for any fields that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>, adds each to the specified container, and stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for each.

The <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> for a component indicates whether the field is inherited from a base class and can be retrieved using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.GetInheritanceAttribute%2A> method.
Gets the inheritance attribute for the specified component.

If the component has been profiled by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> method, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited?displayProperty=fullName>.
Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.

You should call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService.AddInheritedComponents%2A> on the specified component or a parent of the specified component before attempting to obtain an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that reflects the inheritance level of the specified component.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> for which to retrieve the inheritance attribute.
An instance of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance of the specified component.
